responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "EA2EDBA341B38EA4CE8D5194EBEFEAD4", "Out of all the berries you can forage in the Kaelar Riverlands, Bearberries are among the fattest and juiciest you\'ll find. They ripen to a tangy purple when they grow under warm sunlight and crisp, chilly wind. They\'re everywhere in Oakenbane. As tempting as they look though, they aren\'t the home cooking variety. They\'re flavorful enough, but unless you were really starving you\'ll regret the poison aftertaste. Doesn\'t bother bears too much, though. They can\'t get enough of this stuff. Convincing, right?")
name: ED_RVR_M901_ArgumentsSake_StriderScoutB_Dialog_35
